# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $80 by many satisfied customers like yourself. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it's a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. For you, I am offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $75. This is an opportunity to save while enjoying the benefits of our top-tier product. Don't hesitate to seize this offer before it's gone! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
